item.title: CVE-2024-3032|2024-08-01T19:32:42.520Z -- unknown -- themify%20builder
item.description: Themify Builder WordPress plugin before 7.5.8 does not validate a parameter before redirecting the user to its value, leading to an Open Redirect issue
